import subprocess

result = subprocess.run(['top', '-bn1'], capture_output=True, text=True)
print(result.stdout)

import subprocess
result = subprocess.run("selected_cpu_command", capture_output=True, text=True, shell=True)
print(result.stdout)
print(result.stderr)

import subprocess
result = subprocess.run(['df', '-h'], capture_output=True, text=True)
print(result.stdout)

import subprocess

result = subprocess.run(['df', '-h'], capture_output=True, text=True)
print(result.stdout)

# Store the output in a file as requested by writes array
with open('disk_space_raw_output', 'w') as f:
    f.write(result.stdout)
